name: instaportfolio
description: Service that creates a portfolio website out of selected instagramm images

scripts.init: cd vue-ui && npm i && cd ../service && npm i
scripts.start: npm run build && cd service && node server.js
scripts.genCerts: cd service && openssl genrsa -out ssl-key.pem 4096 && openssl req -new -key ssl-key.pem -out certrequest.csr && openssl x509 -req -in certrequest.csr -signkey ssl-key.pem -out ssl-cert.pem

author: Oliver Gorges
